text_partner.title: Partner Rescue, Round 23
text: You text your partner. He’s been curled on a hospital blanket on the floor, trying not to move. You tell him you’ve been kicked out.
He replies: 'Give me five. I'm coming.' You can almost feel the tendon flare radiating through the screen.

Fifteen minutes later, he pulls up, eyes glassy from pain, but smiling. He brought one of the cats in a carrier. Zayka meows furiously the entire ride home like he's personally offended by your treatment.

choices.text: 🚗 Collapse into the car and ride home in silence
📱 Film a TikTok about being saved by love and cats
